<style>
    .header-container {
        background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
        width: 100%;
        padding: 15px 30px;
        position: fixed;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 10px rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1);
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        z-index: 1000;
    }

    .header-content {
        max-width: 1400px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .logo-container {
        flex: 0 0 auto;
    }

    .logo-image {
        height: 60px;
        width: auto;
        transition: transform 0.3s ease;
    }

    .logo-image:hover {
        transform: scale(1.05);
    }

    .nav-container {
        flex: 1;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: flex-end;
    }

    .nav-list {
        list-style: none;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        display: flex;
        gap: 40px;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .nav-link {
        color: #00FF00;
        text-decoration: none;
        font-size: 16px;
        font-weight: 600;
        padding: 8px 0;
        position: relative;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    }

    .nav-link:after {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        width: 0;
        height: 2px;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        background-color: #00FF00;
        transition: width 0.3s ease;
    }

    .nav-link:hover:after {
        width: 100%;
    }

    /* Dropdown Styles */
    .dropdown {
        position: relative;
    }

    .dropdown-content {
        display: none;
        position: absolute;
        background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
        min-width: 220px;
        box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.15);
        border-radius: 4px;
        border: 1px solid rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.2);
        top: 100%;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
        padding: 8px 0;
        opacity: 0;
        transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        z-index: 1002;
    }

    .dropdown:hover .dropdown-content {
        display: block;
        opacity: 1;
    }

    .dropdown-link {
        color: #00FF00;
        text-decoration: none;
        padding: 12px 20px;
        display: block;
        font-size: 15px;
        font-weight: 500;
        text-align: left;
        white-space: nowrap;
        transition: all 0.2s ease;
    }

    .dropdown-link:hover {
        background-color: rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1);
        padding-left: 25px;
    }

    .submenu {
        left: 100%;
        top: -8px;
        transform: none;
    }

    .dropdown:hover > .dropdown-content.submenu {
        display: block;
    }

    /* Mobile Menu Toggle */
    .menu-toggle {
        display: none;
        background: none;
        border: none;
        cursor: pointer;
        padding: 5px;
        margin-left: 10px;
        z-index: 1003;
    }

    .menu-toggle span {
        display: block;
        width: 25px;
        height: 3px;
        margin: 5px 0;
        background: #00FF00;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
    }

    /* Responsive Styles */
    @media (max-width: 1024px) {
        .nav-list {
            gap: 30px;
        }
        .nav-link {
            font-size: 15px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 768px) {
        .header-container {
            padding: 10px 20px;
        }
        .menu-toggle {
            display: block;
        }
        .nav-container {
            position: fixed; /* Changed from absolute to fixed */
            top: 80px;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
            max-height: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
            transition: max-height 0.5s ease;
            z-index: 1001;
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        }
        .nav-container.active {
            max-height: 85vh; /* Limit height to prevent overflow issues */
            overflow-y: auto;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
        }
        .nav-list {
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: flex-start;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 20px;
            gap: 15px;
        }
        .nav-link {
            font-size: 16px;
            width: 100%;
            display: block;
            padding: 10px 0;
            position: relative;
        }
        /* Remove underline animation for mobile */
        .nav-link:after {
            display: none;
        }
        /* Add explicit plus indicator for dropdowns */
        .dropdown > .nav-link:before {
            content: '+';
            position: absolute;
            right: 10px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            font-size: 18px;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #00FF00;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        .dropdown.active > .nav-link:before {
            content: '−'; /* Using minus sign instead of rotating plus */
        }
        .dropdown-content {
            position: static;
            width: 100%;
            transform: none;
            border: none;
            box-shadow: none;
            max-height: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
            opacity: 1;
            display: block;
            padding: 0;
            margin-left: 15px;
            transition: max-height 0.3s ease;
            z-index: 1;
        }
        .dropdown.active .dropdown-content {
            max-height: 1000px;
            padding: 8px 0;
        }
        .dropdown-link {
            padding: 10px 15px;
            position: relative;
        }
        /* Style submenu dropdowns in mobile */
        .dropdown-content .dropdown > .dropdown-link {
            padding-right: 30px; /* Space for plus indicator */
        }
        .dropdown-content .dropdown > .dropdown-link:before {
            content: '+';
            position: absolute;
            right: 10px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            font-size: 18px;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #00FF00;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        .dropdown-content .dropdown.active > .dropdown-link:before {
            content: '−'; /* Using minus sign instead of rotating plus */
        }
        /* Fix submenu position */
        .submenu {
            position: static;
            margin-left: 15px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 480px) {
        .header-container {
            padding: 8px 15px; /* Reduce padding for smaller screens */
        }
        .header-content {

<!-- JavaScript for Mobile Menu -->
<script>
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        const menuToggle = document.querySelector('.menu-toggle');
        const navContainer = document.querySelector('.nav-container');
        const dropdowns = document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown');
        
        // Toggle mobile menu
        menuToggle.addEventListener('click', function() {
            navContainer.classList.toggle('active');
            // Prevent body scrolling when menu is open
            document.body.style.overflow = navContainer.classList.contains('active') ? 'hidden' : '';
        });
        
        // Handle dropdowns on mobile
        dropdowns.forEach(dropdown => {
            const link = dropdown.querySelector('.nav-link, .dropdown-link');
            link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (window.innerWidth <= 768) {
                    if (dropdown.classList.contains('dropdown') && 
                        dropdown.querySelector('.dropdown-content')) {
                        e.preventDefault();
                        e.stopPropagation(); // Prevent event bubbling
                        
                        // Close other same-level dropdowns
                        const parentUl = dropdown.parentNode;
                        const siblings = parentUl.querySelectorAll(':scope > .dropdown');
                        siblings.forEach(sibling => {
                            if (sibling !== dropdown) {
                                sibling.classList.remove('active');
                            }
                        });
                        
                        dropdown.classList.toggle('active');
                    }
                }
            });
        });
        
        // Close menu when clicking outside
        document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            if (window.innerWidth <= 768 && 
                !navContainer.contains(e.target) && 
                !menuToggle.contains(e.target) && 
                navContainer.classList.contains('active')) {
                navContainer.classList.remove('active');
                document.body.style.overflow = '';
            }
        });
        
        // Update menu behavior on window resize
        window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
            if (window.innerWidth > 768) {
                navContainer.classList.remove('active');
                dropdowns.forEach(dropdown => {
                    dropdown.classList.remove('active');
                });
                document.body.style.overflow = '';
            }
        });
    });
</script>

Different needs and budgets can be accommodated, scaling the spectacle up or down. To discuss Neon Nights for your event, call us at 252-764-7628 without any sales pressure. During the call, we'll discuss your objectives, desired show type (including gunge or foam), venue specifics, anticipated audience size, sound and power requirements, location, whether it’s a solo event, customized music needs, and your budget. One-time shows are pricier due to fixed overheads, but shared packages or revenue-split events can make them more affordable. At Emerald Owl Productions, we aim to find the right balance for a memorable Neon Nights experience within your budget—multiple nightly shows also hardly impact the price. Once we have the initial details, future planning becomes simpler. We strive to overcome pricing challenges and bring your event to life, so let's Our Story Our Team Gallery Blog Careers FUN MUSIC INCLUDED! DON'T FORGET TO UNMUTE! Schedule a Neon Night Today! NEON NIGHTS Previously known as a "Laser Light Glow Party," Neon Nights is our marquee, yet perhaps most misunderstood, experience. This is NOT your typical (and often underwhelming) "Glow Party." The interaction we create , combined with the professional production, is the "secret sauce" that makes this event so memorable and unique. And yes, it is family friendly, even if you think it looks a bit like a "rave!" Our first "Laser Light Glow Party," was in Emerald Isle on the Bogue Inlet Pier. We
thought it would be mostly kids with their parents. And while that crowd certainly
showed up, so did everyone else! We saw grandparents leading dances being cheered on by teenagers on a double date! This one truly brings people of all generations together for an incredible evening! . GLOW IN THE DARK FOAM & PAINT line If you think the foam party looks fun, imagine at night with glow in the dark foam and paint!!!! Bring a change of clothes and a towel for this one, you are going to need it......but the fun memories you will leave with are going to last a long time! These can be done as stand-alone smaller events, or add a "SPLASH ZONE" at your outdoor laser light glow party! Rates will be dependent on day of week and how many participants! Give us a call see we can make it happen. GLOW IN THE DARK SPORTS We take any fun activity to a new level by making it glow in the dark. Some ideas may be: *Glow in the Dark Dodgeball * Glow in the Dark Basketball * Glow in the Dark Kickball Neon Nights Pricing Neon Nights are priced uniquely based on your needs and details are needed to get an accurate quote. Different needs and budgets can be accommodated, scaling the spectacle up or down. To discuss Neon Nights for your event, call us at 252-764-7628 without any sales pressure. Neon Nights Pricing Neon Nights are priced uniquely based on your needs and details are needed to get an accurate quote. Different needs and budgets can be accommodated, scaling the spectacle up or down. To discuss Neon Nights for your event, call us at 252-764-7628 without any sales pressure. During the call, we'll discuss your objectives, desired show type (including gunge or foam), venue specifics, anticipated audience size, sound and power requirements, location, whether it’s a solo event, customized music needs, and your budget. One-time shows are pricier due to fixed overheads, but shared packages or revenue-split events can make them more affordable. At Emerald Owl Productions, we aim to find the right balance for a memorable Neon Nights experience within your budget—multiple nightly shows also hardly impact the price. Once we have the initial details, future planning becomes simpler. We strive to overcome pricing challenges and bring your event to life, so let's collaborate!
